body_html:
See the comments in TensorFlowImageListener.java for instructions on updating the model parameters.

You will also need to run strip_unused.py to remove some of the ops unsupported by Android TF that were for training (e.g. DecodeJpeg):

bazel build tensorflow/python/tools:strip_unused
bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/strip_unused --input_graph=inception.pb --output_graph=/tmp/stripped_inception.pb --input_node_names="Mul" --output_node_names="final_result" --input_binary=true
body_text:
See the comments in TensorFlowImageListener.java for instructions on updating the model parameters.
You will also need to run strip_unused.py to remove some of the ops unsupported by Android TF that were for training (e.g. DecodeJpeg):
bazel build tensorflow/python/tools:strip_unused
bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/strip_unused --input_graph=inception.pb --output_graph=/tmp/stripped_inception.pb --input_node_names="Mul" --output_node_names="final_result" --input_binary=true
body:
See the comments in [TensorFlowImageListener.java](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/src/org/tensorflow/demo/TensorFlowImageListener.java) for instructions on updating the model parameters.

You will also need to run strip_unused.py to remove some of the ops unsupported by Android TF that were for training (e.g. DecodeJpeg):

```
bazel build tensorflow/python/tools:strip_unused
bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/strip_unused --input_graph=inception.pb --output_graph=/tmp/stripped_inception.pb --input_node_names="Mul" --output_node_names="final_result" --input_binary=true
```
